title: 359: S*xting Your Spouse + DMing a Cheater’s Partner
itunes:title: 359: S*xting Your Spouse + DMing a Cheater’s Partner
description:
The Broads are back and here to cover a WIDE variety of topics! First they discuss Bekah’s incoming chickens, rooster situation, and Jess’ pet trauma (CW: animal/pet loss 00:03:00 - 00:13:00). Then they dive into Jess’ new style, Bekah’s upcoming girl’s trip and wedding, and snobby art exhibits (00:16:00 - 00:35:00). They chat lying about your age, Jess’ klepto friend, s*xting your partner vs your new hookup, how to end a s*xting conversation, and someone sending you p*rn (00:36:00 - 01:10:00). And The Broads wonder what to do if you find out your hookup is in a relationship, Jess reveals a story she is not proud of, and much more (01:11:00 - 01:37:30)!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
